items.ja: Spurs cruise to victory over 10-man West Ham
items.en: Spurs cruise to victory over 10-man West Ham
items.text_for_match: Spurs cruise to victory over 10-man West Ham Watch Premier League highlights as Tottenham take advantage of Tomas Soucek's red card as Thomas Frank's side cruise to a comfortable 3-0 win over West Ham at the London Stadium. items.ja: Barcola double as PSG beat Lens to extend 100% start
items.en: Barcola double as PSG beat Lens to extend 100% start
items.text_for_match: Barcola double as PSG beat Lens to extend 100% start Bradley Barcola scores twice as Paris St-Germain maintain their 100% Ligue 1 record with a comfortable victory over Lens. Bradley Barcola scores twice as Paris St-Germain maintain their 100% Ligue 1 record with a comfortable victory over Lens.
